title: 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purposes of giving effect to Regulation (EU)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Electricity
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Electricity 

Risk Preparedness) Regulations 2020. 

(2) In these Regulations ‘EU Regulation’ means Regulation (EU) 2019/941 

of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 20191. 

(3) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and is also used 
in the EU Regulation has, unless the context otherwise requires, the same 
meaning in these Regulations as it has in the EU Regulation.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (electricity risk preparedness) regulation 2020 (2) regulation eu regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 941 european parliament council 5 june 20191 (3) word expression used regulation also used eu regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation eu regulation

title: 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purposes of giving effect to Regulation (EU)
heading: 2. The Commission for Regulation of Utilities is hereby designated as the
text_raw:
2. The Commission for Regulation of Utilities is hereby designated as the 

competent authority for the purposes of Article 3 of the EU Regulation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 August 2020. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for Communications, Climate Action 

and Environment. 

1 OJ L 158, 14.6.2019, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [342] 3
